CustomField.description: When Alert is checked, this message displays in the pop-up window a page loads. Use {!My_Custom_Field__c} syntax to display merged values from the child object
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When Alert is checked, this message displays in the pop-up window a page loads. Use {!My_Custom_Field__c} syntax to display merged values from the child object
CustomField.label: Alert Message
